<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Remove Incident Notes</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/v1/api/incidents/{incidentID}/notes"}></MethodEndpoint>



For additional auditing and clarity for your team members, you can programatically delete notes to remove details.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The ID of the recorded incident.","in":"path","name":"incidentID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The region/country of the recorded incident (defaults to the US).","in":"query","name":"region","required":false,"schema":{"enum":["us","eu","uk","jp","in","ap","ca","au","par"],"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Deleted the note for the incident.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"500"} value={"500"}><div>
